glsa.title: Xpdf: User-assisted execution of arbitrary code
glsa.synopsis: Multiple vulnerabilities in Xpdf could result in execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: Xpdf is an X viewer for PDF files.

description.p: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in Xpdf. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

impact.p: A context-dependent attacker could execute arbitrary code or cause a Denial of Service condition.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: Gentoo has discontinued support for Xpdf. We recommend that users unmerge Xpdf:
